name: What I’ve Done
content: 没有血腥 没有辩解
From the truth of a thousand lies
众多谎言中的一个真实
So let mercy come and wash away
让宽容降临 净化洗涤
To cross out what I've become
And let go of what I've done
Put to rest what you thought of me
你所祈求的一切 你所熟悉的我
So let mercy come and wash away
让宽容降临 净化洗涤
To cross out what I've become
And let go of what I've done
忘掉自己 那个以前的自己
To cross out what I've become
And let go of what I've done
